akn:section.akn:heading: Use of public buildings for offices by instructors

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 707. Use of public buildings for offices by instructors Whenever practicable, instructors of the National Guard shall use State armories or other public buildings for offices. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 614.)
Historical and Revision Notes
Revised sectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
70732:74.May 12, 1917, ch. 12 (10th proviso under “National Guard”), 40 Stat. 68.
The word “instructors” is substituted for the words “inspector-instructors”, since there are no longer any “inspector-instructors”.
